author: dkhaywood
msg: NOF: ResolveState - extended so respondToChangesInPersistentObjects returns false for NEW (side-effect of earlier change in ObjectLoaderImpl#createTransientInstance  and setting up of defaults).

author: dkhaywood
msg: NOF: ObjectLoaderImpl;
* As per {@link #createAdapterForTransient(Object)}, however can specify whether or not the
* properties should be defaulted.
* TODO: I don't know why one would never want to default the properties, however have refactored it
* this way to preserve existing semantics.  Rob - please go through everywhere that calls this method
* directly with defaultProperties=false and determine if this is required.  -- Dan
NakedObject createAdapterForTransient(Object object, boolean defaultProperties);
